item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260110.4)
item.description:
What's New

fix: improve restore spelling logic for Vietnamese words

  • Remove unused handleSpace() function (Space handled by processWordBreak)
  • Add hasVietnameseProcessing() to check for tone marks/diacritics
  • Fix restore logic: use dictionary check for words with Vietnamese chars
  • Skip saveWord when restore happens to preserve correct state
  • This fixes restore not working for phonetically valid but invalid words like 'xỷ'
